website_summaries.verdict: Good price point for a 6-month supply of treatment. Extremely easy to use without any mess.
pros: Treatment option that provides neutralization of many septic odors
Causes the tank to break down organic matter faster than normal
Safe to use with plumbing and septic systems
Includes an app to remind you when to perform an application
cons: May cause toilet clogs when applied
Will not eliminate certain odors in the system

customer_reviews.title: but worked excellent, Rid-x was the step down from it
customer_reviews.text: We were using Ridx, but this stuff seems to work just as well, and not so expensive. I will definitely be buying this product again and again. We live in the country and only have a septic system, and this seems to work as well as the really expensive stuff that I cannot name. I use to buy that stuff all the time, and it cost a fortune to buy a years supply, but worked excellent, Rid-x was the step down from it, and this is as good if not better than Rid-x.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Rid X beware because the Green Gobbler is gobbling up your market
customer_reviews.text: I had used Rid X for over 20 years. It had gotten so expensive that I looked for an alternative. Not only is the Green Gobbler a more cost effective septic treatment, the odors from the sewer vent (during lift station pumping) have declined significantly
customer_reviews.author: Willy Lohman

customer_reviews.title: Great for ejector pumps
customer_reviews.text: We had a series of issues with our ejector pump that moves waste water from our lower level bathroom. At the last plumber visit, he said it was soap scum that clogs the works and creates issues. We bought this stuff and have been tossing one packet into the toilet monthly since. Two years on, and so far the plumber has been kept at bay.
customer_reviews.author: J.C.

customer_reviews.title: Clean and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I cannot guarantee that it works but I like the way it is packaged and administered. I used to use another kind and I would only use it randomly whenever I thought to pick it up at the store. I had no idea if it worked either. Also the other kind was more expensive and very messy when I put it in the toilet. I guess there is no way of knowing. I have not had any septic tank problems in years. This product comes in small plastic pellets that dissolve as you flush it leaving no mess in the toilet bowl. I will buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product, great value
customer_reviews.text: All of the Green Gobbler products work great for their intended purpose so this review is more about the particular value in getting the 6 pack, versus the 5 individual packets. This 6 pack includes 6 sachets that weigh just over 60 grams EACH. The other common purchasing option is to buy the 5 individual packets but they only weigh 8 oz each (total of 42 oz) and they cost 4 to 6 dollars more depending on price. If trying to decide which to get, go with the 6 pack.
customer_reviews.author: Troy L.

customer_reviews.title: Like this product alot
customer_reviews.text: Like this product alot. I would have given it a 5 rating but for 1 issue I had with it. When the plastic dissolved a portion of the bad remained and somehow got caught in the underside of the lid of the bowl and caused an issue. Once the plumber diagnosed this problem I now put a small cut in the bag and let the product in the toilet bowl and I throw the plastic away. It may be have been the amount of water that was let in the bowl with each flush. The difference in price is worth it to me to do this minor cutting.
customer_reviews.author: Doris A. Nolte

customer_reviews.title: Did NOT do it's job!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for about a year and a half. We just had our septic inspected and pumped today. The tech was very surprised by how bad our septic was and asked what enzymes we were using and said our enzymes were definitely not doing the job. There was a thick layer of floating "cap" (they call it) and no good bacteria layer that they look for. He asked us to switch to another brand that he named. (contact me if you want that name). We will definitely be switching brands.
customer_reviews.author: Sporty

customer_reviews.title: Not so great for pipes.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in hopes it would help keep the drain lines clear in our remote bathroom. We are constantly having to clear the drain with strong openers. Unfortunately after 6 months of use it doesn't seem to help. Although we have had no problems with the septic, we will need to try something else for the drain lines as they still keep backing up.
customer_reviews.author: Big Daddy

customer_reviews.title: The right way to clear the clog caused by easily biodegradable solids and grease!
customer_reviews.text: The product works well for easily biodegradable solids and grease without introducing harsh chemicals to your household wastewater pipelines. I found best result is achieved by letting the product stay in the pipeline for a while (say, overnight) without flushing it out from the pipeline completely (for example, one flush for toilet and about 1 gallon of water in kitchen sink). Hardened grease is the main cause of plugged kitchen sink and this product works well with grease. Seems environmentally friendlier than chemical treatment (e.g., chlorine and other chemicals). A pack of 6 is enough for all toilets and sinks in a typical household. If there is plug caused by hair in the drain, strong chemicals still work better.
customer_reviews.author: C. J. Lin

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Greatly exceeded our expectations and saved us a ton of money! We have been paying $200-300 to have our septic tank pumped out due to the showers not draining and the toilets bubbling. We had been told we would have to replace our field lines and was given an estimate of $2500-$3000. We decided to try this product and it worked! We haven’t had a single issue since we started using them and it has been over 6 months! We will continue using them, and recommend trying these before shelling out a ton of money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This didn't work for me.
customer_reviews.text: I ended up going with another product that worked. I wouldn't buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Qvox

customer_reviews.title: Does NOT work
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t work. I followed the instructions perfectly and I’m on my 3rd pod. I see NO DIFFERENCE in toilet function (slow flush) In comparison to not using it. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: empress

customer_reviews.title: I always use bacteria packs for my septic. Always.
customer_reviews.text: For the last 3 years I have only used this Green Gobbler and greenpig. The Green Gobbler is a better value as you get more packs for the same money. I drop one pack a month and sometimes one every 2 weeks. I haven't had any septic issues since using the Green Gobbler. So I believe the Green Gobbler has to be doing something good even though I can't prove it.
customer_reviews.author: V. Gibson

customer_reviews.title: Its an old uilding with old pipes and it was just horrible. But this took care of it
customer_reviews.text: After weeks of begging my office mangaer to get this and it "slipping his mind" I finally just bought it myself. OMG! The bathrooms actually don't stink anymore. Its an old uilding with old pipes and it was just horrible. But this took care of it!!
customer_reviews.author: TheVamPirateQueen

customer_reviews.title: GREAT STUFF
customer_reviews.text: This product is great. The instructions are simple. Drop it in and flush. Leave it up to the contents to do the rest of the work. We have a small septic tank and a lot of users in our household. Usually we need the septic tank to be serviced every 8 months or so. We have been using this product for my septic system for over a year or so and haven't had to have a septic system suck out yet. It's very inexpensive insurance for your system. Also no odor from the contents of the pouch.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Graves

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for me!
customer_reviews.text: I don't know where all the negative reviews came from, but my experience after a year of use, is extraordinary, my septic hill has stopped leaking and toilets etc work much better. I have ordered and used this a few times since initial purchase, just flush it once a month and no problems. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work
customer_reviews.text: I am down to my last two, it has a 6 month supply in one bag.. I no longer smell our septic.. in fact the first time I used this product I did not smell it for all most 3 weeks, by then it was time for another month's flush. So that has been 4 months ago and there is no longer a septic smell outside.. I will be buying more of this lovely little product it seems to work and is at a way better price than what I had been purchasing at the local grocery store!
customer_reviews.author: Jinny12

customer_reviews.title: Seems to Work
customer_reviews.text: When it comes to products design to prevent problems it's kind of hard to know how well they work since you don't know what issues you would have had without them. I have a small, very old septic system with lines in very rocky soil, I pop a Green Gobbler in once a month and I've never had an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Len

customer_reviews.title: Easy preventative action...
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Hoping to prevent any problems. We should have none but always good to treat the tank. Easy to mess up the bacteria balance. Last clean out was pretty smelly so hoping for a more pleasant experience next time. Update: all was great for a complete house sale mandated septic inspection and I will be darned... it did help a lot with odor. I can’t say it is a miracle worker but I did spend serious time around the dig and 3 ports spots they opened and the cleaning/ removal. I believe in this product as a good practices going forward. An “ounce of prevention” never fit better to describe.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Individual packages that dissolve easily.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this to repopulate the bacteria in my septic system after having it pumped. I dropped one of the plastic packages into the toilet and watched as it started to dissolve in the water. I flushed it down, and now it is inside the septic tank where it is doing whatever it is supposed to do. Maybe it works. Maybe sugar or yeast would be as good. How can anyone tell?
customer_reviews.author: J. Henry

customer_reviews.title: Nice product!
customer_reviews.text: We use this as a safe guard for keeping our septic running well. So far so good. It is difficult to tell how well it is working since I am not going to stick my head in the septic tank. LOL! This is our second order of the monthly tablets after finding the product so we feel confident in the product. We watched many YouTube reviews before setting in on this product. We love the packaging of the product. Just place in the toilet and flush the product with the self desolving package down. No mess like some of the other brands. The packaging reminds me of a dish washer packet.
customer_reviews.author: Cory

customer_reviews.title: still not improving the septic smell..
customer_reviews.text: it's been over a week now and so far the smell still the same. maybe the effect will take time... i'll wait until the changes come....so for the meantime this is my review and will change it if ever there is a positive feedback...
customer_reviews.author: Albert 101

customer_reviews.title: they list all of the facets of septic tank functions that they clean and it's a pretty long list
customer_reviews.text: I prefer these Septic Tank cleaners to the products that you buy in stores. Mainly, they list all of the facets of septic tank functions that they clean and it's a pretty long list. I actually use these twice a month and never have had a problem. And I've been using them for a long time. Seems like a good product even if it is hard to evaluate effectiveness since the septic tank is underground.
customer_reviews.author: maddog5

customer_reviews.title: DID NOTHING!!
customer_reviews.text: This was a waste of my money! I used it three times in 6 weeks thinking maybe it needed ta boost to work! Made absolutely NO difference in the clogged toilet! Had to use plunger and the outside pipe still makes the same noise! SAVE YOUR MONEY!!
customer_reviews.author: Carol Loughner

customer_reviews.title: Maintenance
customer_reviews.text: I own two single-family homes on one lot. I put in my basement toilet to make sure the tree roots from the yard does not become an issue. My daughter had drain issues with her bathroom shower and kitchen and bathroom sink. We share the same water and sewer line. I used it and it cleared up her issues as well. So, I will be repurchasing. Yes, as other reviews it has a smell, but it was not so horrible I could not bare smelling.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth xyz

customer_reviews.title: Great Stuff!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff unclogged my backed up shower and toilet. Sure, it is to be used as a preventative to clogs but the fact that it actually unclogged my drain means it does what it says. Never going back to Rid-Ex.
customer_reviews.author: Mary.J

customer_reviews.title: Septic Saver Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: We are only into our 2nd month of using this product, so we don't really know yet about how it is working in our septic system. But I like that the product is pre-measured into a small pouch that you simply just flush down the toilet once a month. I purchased it because of all the good reviews that were given by other people and the price was reasonable too.
customer_reviews.author: MARY LINN

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use, convenient and economical. I’ve always used the boxed product before this so the pods are a pleasant change. I’ve been using Green Gobbler for 2 months now. Septic treatments are the kind of product that works quietly and out of sight so, short term, there’s no way of telling how well it’s working. So far, so good! As long as there's no back ups, gurgling or evil smells, I’m a happy customer. Time will tell. If it keeps my system working as well as the other products do, I’ll be sticking with Green Gobbler!
customer_reviews.author: D. Walsh

customer_reviews.title: Da Shadow Do!
customer_reviews.text: Who really knows if this stuff or the popular Rid-X works? No one. But it is cheap insurance against a really messy and expensive problem - so I buy it and use it. If I don't have a problem, I really won't know if it was the result of using this stuff, or nothing would have happened if I used nothing. But since it is cheaper than Rid-X, WTF.
customer_reviews.author: MrEd

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be working! We got our septic pumped ...
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be working! We got our septic pumped and the guy said that we should keep doing what we're doing. Just be sure to keep up with it. It's a maintenance thing--not a magic thing!
customer_reviews.author: vermontdreams

customer_reviews.title: Excellent results
customer_reviews.text: Since I moved to my home couple of years ago and living for the first time in home with a septic tank, I needed to find some thing to effectively maintain a healthy septic tank. When I moved to my new home, I could notice a funny smell coming from the sinks, but after a week of the initial usage of Green Gobbler Septic Saver, smell went away. Really happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Raul Duque Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Worked
customer_reviews.text: Toilet water started to rise every time we flushed a noticeable amount before going down. Started using these once a month and the problem went away
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Much easier to use than RID-X
customer_reviews.text: I have been using RID-X for years and I have always estimated the amount needed to place in the toilet for each month of service. The Green Gobbler eliminates that by packaging each monthly service dosage into tidy small water-soluble packets. Just drop one into the toilet and it immediately starts to dissolve and then flush it...that's it. It cannot be simpler than that.
customer_reviews.author: Erwin Reyes

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I must say, this is a great product. We normally buy RidX but it wasn't in our budget. After reading several reviews, I decided to go with Green Gobbler. Our toilets were starting to gurgle anytime both showers were occupied or toilet and shower were being used at the same time. This went on for a week. That's when I purchased the product. I flushed one small pouch down each toilet. We haven't heard anymore gurgling or had any backing up. I am definitely going to buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Dana McIntyre

customer_reviews.title: It really works
customer_reviews.text: It worked a lot faster than I thought it would. We have no more problem with the toilet making noise when the washing machine is running. I thought it was too late to try anything. My daughter has never added anything to the septic tank. I will be ordering more. Update: Ordered more 10-7-20
customer_reviews.author: DoAll

customer_reviews.title: Bought to use in place of store brands
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to substitute for Rid-x off of a recommendation from another person that has septic/oxidation pond, we shall see. Much better price compared to other store brands, hope it works as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Inness

customer_reviews.title: Is working as advertised and has been for more than a year!
customer_reviews.text: As an owner of a home with a septic tank I was drawn to this product because it was made with more natural products and not harsh chemicals I do hope it is doing its job I have no way of knowing for sure but we have been using it for a year now and have had no adverse problems so I do feel that it is working as it is advertised. Therefore I give it my recommendation and I continue to buy and use. I feel that is a true testimonial
customer_reviews.author: myamie1

customer_reviews.title: hard to judge with a product like this. Was hearing some slight gurgling upon flushing
customer_reviews.text: Shipped timely and packaged well. We'll see how it works.....hard to judge with a product like this. Was hearing some slight gurgling upon flushing. Put in product and let it set in septic while away at work. Have not heard the sound since, so perhaps it is already having an effect......just can't be certain. No problems would equal success!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Septic Maintenance
customer_reviews.text: About 4 months ago I noticed a small amount of liquid beginning to surface from my septic drain field and began using the gobbler monthly. I began with two packets the first month and one packet each month since. Now, no more liquid pooling, and my septic system seems to be working perfectly. This is a great product and the price is very reasonable. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Voyager57

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work.
customer_reviews.text: It’s hard to tell if this is really working but it does appear to be doing its job based on the amount of sewage in our septic tank. The noticeable thing is the significant reduction of septic odors during winter months. I believe it is important to use enzymes to reduce the amount of necessary pumping.
customer_reviews.author: S. Humphrey

customer_reviews.title: NO MORE SMELLY DRAINS
customer_reviews.text: Monthly, I've been dropping one packet into the toilet after everyone goes to bed (as recommended per the instructions). It works like a charm! The morning afterward, the smelly drains are gone. So far our septic tank has still been functioning well and seemingly healthy.
customer_reviews.author: S. Hicks

customer_reviews.title: Poopoo gone!
customer_reviews.text: The biggest issue we have with our RV is the septic tank. We empty it every other week but the smell was terrible until I found greengobbler. This is the best!!! It solved my smelly issue and I don't have to empty the tank as often. I totally recommend this product!!
customer_reviews.author: PurpleCat61

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and it works
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. It's just a good a Rid-x at half the price and it works. It's easy to use - just drop it in and flush. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I see your products on QVC all the time. They came with highly recommendations. It was Super easy just take one out and drop it in the toilet. We had guests over and they use the wipes in the toilet and I didn't want to cause a big mess so I ordered this product works great.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Y Curry

customer_reviews.title: This stuff works!
customer_reviews.text: Green gobbler works just like it says it would! We have a two stage septic system due to the drain fields being above our house. This means the 'grey' water is pumped from the second tank to the drain fields. We were having issues with the 'black' water and solids not completely breaking down before moving to the second tank which was causing issues with our pump (impeller clogging on debris). Green Gobbler totally eliminated our issues within a few weeks and we couldn't be happier. We heartily recommend this product to anyone on a system system.
customer_reviews.author: T. Reagan

customer_reviews.title: Why not
customer_reviews.text: I've heard to add these and I've heard that I'm not supposed to. I figure that it's not going to hurt. They work well. I think the "free app" is gimmicky as is the "guarantee" that they work or your money back. If something happens to the septic system, I'm not going to be contacting the company for a few bucks when I'm facing a $12,000 new septic system. Presentation is nice though.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: I have a prewar building toilet that usually gets clogged at least once a month. And I just dropped one to my clogged toilet ball with water line half of the way, I let it sit for 30 min (as I didn’t want to have water overflow) the product worked great, everything that was floating in the toilet ball, went completely with the product down to the system. Will recommend this product to my fam and friends.
customer_reviews.author: LydiaChenault

customer_reviews.title: Helped tremendously!
customer_reviews.text: Our yard was constantly wet around our septic tank. Not ever having a septic tank before I attributed this to a wet spring. Until it NEVER went away. It took about 2 months for this to completely clear up our issue and I did a double dose to start with, but now our yard is bone dry around the septic and this was the only thing I changed! This will save your septic system. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia Herlein

customer_reviews.title: SEPTIC SAVER
customer_reviews.text: Finally an effective plunger = "Powder Plunger"! These environmentally safe pods help me to maintain my septic tank and reduce odors; backups; plus breakdown solids safely in the lines. I simply just throw 1 pod in a month, flush and keep my toilet safe & clean! This is the best septic tank treatment ever to avoid expensive repairs and replacements.
customer_reviews.author: TMN

customer_reviews.title: Caused issues with washing machine drain line.
customer_reviews.text: After using this several months I realized the washing machine drain line gets stopped up after I have flushed green gobbler down toilet. This last time was so bad my washing machine drain water backed up into bathtub. May help some systems but we won’t use it again. Just pay attention to any signs of drain clogging after use.
customer_reviews.author: Rooster

customer_reviews.title: I will be flushing one of these regularly!
customer_reviews.text: Recently moved into a house with a septic system and clogged a toilet last week. I read quite a bit online before I purchased something to open the clog. I knew I did not want to put any harsh chemicals into the system, so I purchased these due to positive reviews. After we unblocked the clog, I flushed one of these. I will be flushing them regularly to keep things flowing smoothly!
customer_reviews.author: Maria Mir

customer_reviews.title: They work for me.
customer_reviews.text: It works in our apartment toilet. I use flushable wipes and the toilet was constantly getting clogged but ever since I started using these no more clogging. They are a little pricey but worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Katania

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use! Just drop in a premeasured packet in the toilet bowl, before retiring for the night. Give it 2 flushes and you are done. We have never had any septic problems and hope that Green Gobbler Septic Saver keeps it that way. Alas you cannot see what is happening because it's happening several feet under the ground.
customer_reviews.author: W. Schultz

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, had been using rid x the past 6 years but was getting a little expensive so I decided to give this a try. Had used it for 3 months prior to getting the septic tank pumped out and seemed to help with the bad smell. I also like that antibacterial soaps and bleach does not effect the bacteria in the packets. Good value for a 6 month supply.
customer_reviews.author: JPE_575

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using the Green Gobbler each month for the past two years, and it seems to be a great product. Plumbers DO recommend it, and since we are on a septic system currently, thought it would be a good idea. Very simple and easy to drop a packet in the toilet and flush it down the first of each month. Can, and apparently does, prevent problems and expensive pumping, etc.
customer_reviews.author: RC Evans

customer_reviews.title: Get the BEST thing possible for septic tanks
customer_reviews.text: We have not yet used this product.. We have always used Rid X, because we thought it was the best, but when we had the septic tank pumped the man told us about Green Gobbler & how much better it was. After reading about it we knew we wanted to get the best product possible. That is why we bought it. I just wished we would have known about it sooner. I have never even seen it advertised on TV. If it was you probably wouldn't be able to keep up with the demand.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Berry

customer_reviews.title: Regular use really improves the septic system-no more back-ups!
customer_reviews.text: Green Gobbler Septic Saver is an excellent product! It is so easy use and safe for septic systems; safely keeps your system clear without causing any damage! As a city dweller, I am very happy with the ease of keeping my bathroom flowing without waiting for a super to get around to it! I also recommended it to my friend, the owner of a large home in the suburb who constantly complained of his septic system. His family is grateful that they don’t have to listen to his complaints anymore! Thanks for such a well-made product that is so easy to use!! We are customers for life!
customer_reviews.author: deedeetee

customer_reviews.title: Seems to help
customer_reviews.text: My septic system is part of a shared system with other homes so it is quite a large tank. I am the only one who uses a septic cleaner. We have not needed the tank pumped in a few years so yes, I definitely think this has helped although I don't have 100% proof because I don't know how often a large shared tank should be pumped.
customer_reviews.author: Rivergirl

customer_reviews.title: Quick and Tidy Application
customer_reviews.text: I really like the convenience of this product. The premeasured dissolvable packs can be stored near the toilet and popped in and flushed. With the traditional products you have to wrestle to open the cardboard box and dump loose product in that doesn't typically flush the first time and often sticks to the sides of the bowl. These are tidy palm sized mesh packets. I also like that I get a 6 month supply in a re-sealable ziplock back. I only have to think about purchasing twice a year and the storage space is minimal.
customer_reviews.author: Julia L. Greer

customer_reviews.title: Stubborn turd gone!
customer_reviews.text: I had a clogged toilet that wouldn't flush for days. I didn't want to have to call a plumber and a friend said try this. Put it in and left overnight. Took two flushes and things were flowing with ease 😀
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me :(
customer_reviews.text: For a while I thought it was working, but shortly thereafter I realized my septic system was back to where it was before I started using it. Same symptoms. Trying a different product now.
customer_reviews.author: evlopez54

customer_reviews.title: A valuable product
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Green Gobbler Septic Saver for a year or more, and I am completely satisfied that it is doing its job. No septic tank problems at all. The little packets are easy to use, and are certainly inexpensive compared to many other septic tank products. I have just ordered my next 6-pack.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. P. Smurf

customer_reviews.title: More economical than Rid-X
customer_reviews.text: Based on other reviews, especially those who had not used a septic bacteria pack before, I chose to go with Green Gobbler because it gives you a 6-month supply (as opposed to the Rid-X 3-month supply), and the cost was less. I've used it once and haven't noticed any smell or back-up, so we'll see over the next few months. I had previously used Rid-X for 15 years; hope I don't have to revert.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy J.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, good packaging
customer_reviews.text: Used to use a product called "GreenPig Septic Treatment" and haven't been able to find it at my local store. Saw this on Amazon and thought I'd give it a try. So far, so good. We are just two people in the house so we don't have the flow of a larger household. Haven't noticed any changes-good or bad!
customer_reviews.author: SaraOnTheGo

customer_reviews.title: Don't bother
customer_reviews.text: This stuff actually made things worse and totally clogged things up. Packets are too large and dissolve too slowly.
customer_reviews.author: russ silva

customer_reviews.title: So easy
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time I've had septic instead of a sewer. I triad using the septic aid that uses a dry powder2 and had a great deal of trouble getting it completely flushed down. The Green Gobbler is SO-O-O much easier to use; just toss in a packet and flush twice! I also use the Green Gobbler drain cleaner, and it keeps all my drains smelling fresh.
customer_reviews.author: Gramma

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: 1st review.. Not sure how to review because I dont look in my septic tank lol. But the seller is great. Great price, quick shipping, very easy to use. There are 6 pouches in the bag and you just toss one in the toilet and flush! ***I ordered a 2nd time! We've had no problems. These are easy to use. Just flush one of the pod/pack things each month. Easy and no mess.
customer_reviews.author: Schon Layman

customer_reviews.title: The product is guranteed
customer_reviews.text: I'm hoping the product stands up for what they advertise. As all owners of septic systems, maintaining so it lasts a long time is important to avoid expensive repairs. I wasn't having problems before using this product and only changed because of the reviews and research I did making me believe it was a better product. It's hard for me to rate but I will say that I'm on my second bag and my system seems to be ok. If anything changes you can bet I'll be back to let everyone know.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Good product, but my septic guy told me to not use it.
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a good product. My septic guy feels using these is not good. Keeping a septic free of anything other than TP and human waste is the best way to keep a tank healthy. No food, grease, or anything foreign and your tank will run better than with the use of these things.
customer_reviews.author: EROK

customer_reviews.title: Customer for life...
customer_reviews.text: My toilet was backed up and the water pressure was messed for over a week. I tried using liquid plumber, a plumbing snake and a plunger but nothing worked until I brought Green Gobbler. After using two septic saver packs, my toilet is running better. Definitely a customer for life now.
customer_reviews.author: B. Nicole

customer_reviews.title: very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I tried some other products and had to go through step 1, step 2 etc.. this product is very easy to use and I have not complaints about this product. If you use the other expensive brand, with the measuring and spilling. I would suggest that you change and save some money for a better one.
customer_reviews.author: JLS

customer_reviews.title: Love These
customer_reviews.text: Can't in give the product a 5 star rating and be able to sleep at night simply because I feel that Green Gobbler is overpriced! That being said however, this is a great product that works as expected and does not disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: Steven R Burgess

customer_reviews.title: easy to use
customer_reviews.text: These pacs are simple to use. I honestly can't say if they work since I'm not a septic expert. But in the six months I've been using them to help prevent trouble, I can say that my system has been operating properly. I purchased another set of 6 for the months ahead as a result
customer_reviews.author: RK

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using these for a year now. Started out with extremely smelly septic outside and black water backing up into bathtub when washer drained. After a month of use smell grew lighter, water didn't back up as much, after 2 months no water back up, after a little less than 3 months no sewer smell outside anymore! I am ecstatic! I also use their drain strips and have used their drain cleaner. All excellent products. Customer service is great too!! and very friendly! Highly recommended! You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Sadler63

customer_reviews.title: Gobble dz
customer_reviews.text: Backed up my sink some how. If i could post the picture. But save your self the time and money on expensive repairs from using a cheap money saver claims to bathroom repair savers like this one
customer_reviews.author: OJ

customer_reviews.title: Same stuff sewage treatment plants use and convenient.
customer_reviews.text: I have a new septic system and would like to keep it healthy. This product looks identical to the product we use at the sewage treatment plant at work. The plant is maintained to strict biological and pH standards. I'm reasonably certain this product is the same stuff we use at an industrial plant serving about a 1000 people.
customer_reviews.author: eman85

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I had a foul odour constantly coming from the bathroom even after I just clean it. I flushed two packets of green gobbler at the same time down the toilet. I repeat the process the following day and now the foul odor is gone.
customer_reviews.author: sher

customer_reviews.title: Giant pile of powder.
customer_reviews.text: They were all exploded inside the package and unusable. I dumped the entire pack in my toilet and it was hilarious. They need better packaging. It was a pile of powder. I had no clue how much to dump.
customer_reviews.author: Savannah Saletri

customer_reviews.title: MAKE IT GO DOWN
customer_reviews.text: This product seems to be working great. Before I started using this product every time someone used the toilet it would get backed uo. Especially the one in the master bedroom, now it flushes normal how it's suppose to. Awesome product it really does work!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: This product is the best I've used. It's small and easy. If you want to download their app, you can even get a monthly reminder to use it. It is much less expensive than the identical product I used to buy from my septic service. And I've had no trouble with my system since using it.
customer_reviews.author: Gramma Car

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: I have always used another product and it was such a mess to use. This is the easiest product to use monthly. I do it the first day of each month. Will continue to purchase this. Have recommended it to all my friends and they too are ordering.
customer_reviews.author: Ava H. Coley

customer_reviews.title: This works for us
customer_reviews.text: Have used this product monthly for a couple of years, just drop in and flush once a month. We’re new to the “septic world” so we do everything possible to keep it maintained well. I’ll keep using this product since we are maintaining everything well
customer_reviews.author: P. G.

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: We bought this product 6 months ago and started using this in place of Ridex. We had no problems using this and our septic system is working great. So we purchased this product again because we are very satisfied with how it works.
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: Did not work
customer_reviews.text: It did not help t fix my toilet problems. Used all the bags still not working, so at the end, my family call plumber company to fix the toilet.
customer_reviews.author: Kilou

customer_reviews.title: It boosts your septic tank culture and eliminates odors.
customer_reviews.text: We started getting a smell issue outside with our septic system, so I figured the culture in the tank needed some help. O happened upon Green Gobbler and thought it was worth a try for the price and ease of use. And ease of use indeed. One pod in the toilet, and down it goes! Within a day and a half, the smell was virtually gone, and by the day after that, completely gone. Fantastic! It saved me calls to the septic company and potentially a couple hundred dollars for a visit.
customer_reviews.author: xinpheld

customer_reviews.title: Works Well
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and easier to actually get into the septic tank than an unwrapped product. I used this once or more a month for a year before my septic tank was cleaned. Since there was no build-up of tissue or fat/grease, I'm assuming that it did its job. :)
customer_reviews.author: Denise DeBolt

customer_reviews.title: Keep that septic tank clear!
customer_reviews.text: This is for the septic tank. The product arrived very quickly. I am only ready to use it at the 1st of the month, and will know know how well it works for several months. It was a very good value compared to other similar products.
customer_reviews.author: Sally1222

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work well.
customer_reviews.text: We were starting to have some issues with odor from our septic and our toilets draining slowly in a house we recently moved into, and after reading the reviews decided to give this a try. It arrived within a couple days and was incredibly easy to use, just needing to flush a pod down the toilet. Since then the issues have definitely gotten better, if not disappeared completely. I plan on using this monthly to keep everything running smoothly.
customer_reviews.author: Brian P.

customer_reviews.title: Faithful User
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I have purchased this product. I chose not to use the more expensive, more well known product because of this products ease of use. Just drop it and flush it, no measuring or spilling or nothing. The powder on the inside of the pods looks exactly like the other product mentioned earlier... so why pay more for more work? I am extremely happy and will continue to buy this product for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Lightle

customer_reviews.title: Purchased to prevent septic tank problems
customer_reviews.text: The shipping was fast . The price was very reasonable, less than local stores. I use it as close to the directions as I can remember to do. It can't be any easier to use and I have been using it for years and have not had any problems. I intend to continue using it. Getting a 6 month supply at a time is great.
customer_reviews.author: J.C.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use and Cheaper than Rid-Ex
customer_reviews.text: Have usually used Rid-Ex got our septic system, but this product is the same price for 6 months as opposed to one. Easy to use, just drop in a pod into toilet and flush. Use once a month. Hard to know if it’s working, but has good reviews and so far, no septic issues
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I like this as it is so easy to use and seems to be doing a great job in our septic system. I like this so much better than Ridex. Plus I like supporting small business and American companies. Definitely recommend this product:)
customer_reviews.author: Catlady76

customer_reviews.title: just what i expected
customer_reviews.text: Green Gobbler came super fast and is super easy to use no measuring or having an open box of powder sitting around; just drop one pouch in the toilet once a month and you're done. So happy it's that easy. This is my first time using this product but I have had no issues with our septic..
customer_reviews.author: jess H

customer_reviews.title: Goes down in one flush!
customer_reviews.text: This is so much easier than RidX. The packets make everything go down in one flush. We had been having septic issues and had the tank pumped out. No problems since. Keeping my fingers crossed.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn

customer_reviews.title: Best I have used!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, have been using it for a couple years now. Especially like that it's not killed off by chemicals used to clean the toilet. Used other brands, and still had septic tank problems. Have had none with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Kinder

customer_reviews.title: It works like it says it will
customer_reviews.text: If you have to depend on a septic system, this stuff is a good buy. Having to have septic systems pumped and/or repaired is very expensive. The stuff has greatly extended our time between visits from the pro plumbers.
customer_reviews.author: Silver Fox 42

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Been using for several months and it's one of those things you don't really know if it working or not but haven't had any problems, after 3 years I usually do by now, need a cleaning every 3 years, so I'm going to keep on using it and see what happens!
customer_reviews.author: K. Adams

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous Product That Works!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is fabulous! We're on a septic system and the sinks were emptying slowly. I followed instructions on the sinks with just one treatment and voila! I'm using those for the septic system maintenance as well!
customer_reviews.author: LindaK

customer_reviews.title: You’ll never know
customer_reviews.text: I realized you can’t tell if this type of product actually works! It’s easy to use, neat and reasonably priced. But this type of product is like vitamins, you have to believe they are doing something. So I will continue to use this.
customer_reviews.author: Void

customer_reviews.title: easy to use, costs less, effective
customer_reviews.text: I have only used this once so far, you're supposed to flush a little pack once a month... it's a six month supply, not three month, which I like. Hopefully this is make it so I don't need to pump out my cesspool every 2 years.
customer_reviews.author: K. R. Sontag

product_meta.title: Green Gobbler SEPTIC SAVER Bacteria Enzyme Pacs - 6 Month Septic Tank Supply (FREE Green Gobbler REMINDER APP) 7.8 oz Total
feature_bullets: NEVER HAVE SEPTIC PROBLEMS AGAIN. Protect your septic tank with Green Gobbler Septic Saver. Using the most powerful bacteria and digestive enzymes available, Septic Saver digests grease, fats, oils, paper, and organic matter to keep your sewer line and septic tank clear.

PREVENT COSTLY SEPTIC BACKUP AND REPAIRS. Green Gobbler Septic Saver digests clog-producing material to keep your septic tank from overflowing and ruining your property. Don’t pay up to $7, 000 on septic tank repair. Just use Septic Saver!

CONTAINS 6 MONTHS OF TREATMENT. Each bag of Septic Saver contains 6 water-soluble packs. Simply drop and flush one pack into your downstairs bathroom toilet once a month for preventive septic tank maintenance.

REDUCE SEPTIC ODORS. Septic odors are some of the most obnoxious and toxic odors known to man. Septic Saver’s powerful enzymes will digest organic matter that may be stuck inside of your main sewer line to keep septic odors at bay.
, OR YOUR MONEY BACK. Green Gobbler’s conscious creations are safer, stronger, and more effective than caustic chemicals. 30-day money back .
